main.name: Pritish Panda
main.description: If you want a friendly and smart person, then it's me
main.bio: An innovative and ingenious third-year student at the University of Toronto Scarborough, specializing in Computer Science-Software Engineering Stream who loves developing applications that focus on human interactions and interest. Capable of working on challenging problems and develop analytics using critical thinking.
main.contactmessage: Questions? Comments? Just fill out the information listed, and I will respond as soon as possible. Thanks!

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

education.degree: Honours Bachelor of Science, Co-op Specialist: Computer Science and Mathematics

work.title: Java Developer
description: Assesed on implementing API Gateways using Kong and Google Apigee to improve service discovery and routing across multiple microservices, resulting in a 30% reduction in latency and improved scalability.
Implemented a Service mesh architecture using Istio and Envoy to provide secure, resilient communication between microservices, resulting in a 50% reduction in service downtime.
Developed a Java Spring Boot microservice for the Wealth360 platform to process and analyze real-time market data from Solace messaging platform, improving the accuracy of financial models by 20%.

work.title: SDE
description: Assessed and analyzed APIs and stress scripts for an Embedded system that incorporated the Thales Onboard Platform (TOP) hardware on SIMS, resulting in identifying and resolving critical issues, reducing system downtime by 25%.
Developed and implemented REST APIs in Node.js and Express, enabling the analytics team to increase reporting speed by 30%, resulting in faster decision-making and improved business outcomes.

work.title: Web-Developer
description: Developed and contributed to the hackathon's judging platform using PostgreSQL and GraphQL, resulting in a 50% decrease in judging time and a 25% increase in accuracy for event organizers and participants.

work.title: Back-end Developer
description: Operated as a backend developer in a team of 7 members to resolve client-impacting bugs and designed 4 REST APIs using Django to incorporate new features into a competition portal accessed by 100+ delegates and judges.

projects.title: Insight
projects.category: Conceptualized and developed a web application that helps user's who are socially inactive.

projects.title: Plasma Share
projects.category: Developed a plasma donation app that allows Covid-19 patients to find verified and eligible plasma donors for successful recovery in a span of 2 days.

projects.title: Detect Neurological problems
projects.category: Had an Accident? Bumped your head Somewhere? Take this test to detect early on if you have Dementia.

testimonials.text: That Pritish Panda must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met!Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
